data.eml:eml: Revision of the spider genus Gippsicola Hogg, 1900 (Araneae: Segestriidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giroti, André Marsola, Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2017): Revision of the spider genus Gippsicola Hogg, 1900 (Araneae: Segestriidae). Zootaxa 4227 (3): 390-406, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.3.6
